uid.description: The user's unique ID from Firebase Authentication.

createdAt.description: The date and time the user profile was created.

Debtor.title: Debtor
Debtor.description: Represents a debtor with their associated debt information.

alias.description: Unique alias for the debtor, scoped to the owner.

totalDebt.description: The total cumulative amount of debt owed by the debtor.

ownerUid.description: The UID of the user who owns this debtor record.

debts.description: A list of individual debt/payment records.

DebtRecord.title: DebtRecord
DebtRecord.description: Represents a single transaction (debt or payment) for a debtor.

id.description: Unique identifier for the debt record.

amount.description: The amount of the transaction. Positive for debt, negative for payment.

date.description: The date when the transaction occurred.

definition.description: Stores public information for a user.
Stores debtor documents, each containing an array of their debt records.
